name: microfrontend-grupo1
description: Sistema de microfrontends con Module Federation

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/dashboard && npm install && cd ../shell && npm install && cd ../evaluacion && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:dashboard" "npm run dev:shell" "npm run dev:evaluacion"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:dashboard && npm run build:shell && npm run build:evaluacion
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build:all && npm run deploy:dashboard && npm run deploy:shell && npm run deploy:evaluacion
scripts.firebase:init: cd apps/dashboard && firebase init hosting && cd ../shell && firebase init hosting && cd ../evaluacion && firebase init hosting
